venue.name: Wild Rover Bar Boston - 1 Block from Faneuil Hall

item.description:
Boston Singles Party

- Awesome Venue!
- Lots of Space!
- Longer Party!
- Lots of Free Food!
- 2 Free Drinks
- DJ & Dancing!
- Cool & Available Singles!
- Soooooooooo Much Fun!!!!!!!

Read the past 2 party reviews at the bottom!

Single and Ready to Mingle? Then come on out to the next Boston Singles Party!

DO NOT DOUBLE RSVP! PLEASE RSVP IN ONE GROUP ONLY.

Our next Boston Singles Party is hosted at Wild Rover (near Faneuil Hall) at 63 Chatham Street in Boston MA, on Saturday, January 26th from 7 to 11 pm. It doesn't end at 11, it just opens up to public, and we're free to stay and dance all night!

***Important Note***  If you come after 10 PM, the venue charges a cover at the door, and then there's the cover for this party too, so get there BEFORE 10 pm!

We have the entire floor to ourselves, complete with our own bar, couches, DJ, tables and chairs.

When you arrive, proceed to the second floor where you'll find Matt, your gracious host. Please introduce yourself to me, tell me which Meetup group you're with, and pay with a $10 bill (no 1's, 5's or 20's please, 10's only, saves time and is easier when theres a line). Everyone pays $10 cash, so come prepared!

What do you get for $10?

Free Drink Details:

If you come in between 7:00 and 8:00 pm, you will get 2 drink tickets good for any beer, any wine, and lots of mixed drinks! (NO: shots or top-shelf liquor i.e., Patron, etc.) These tickets will NOT be given out past 8 PM PERIOD - NO exceptions. Get there early!

Drink tickets expire at 8:30, so even if you get there at 7:59, you still have time to finish your first one before you get your second one! ;)

Free Food Details:

Buffet is available for everyone from 7 PM until 10 PM. There will be refills when needed, and they are very good about keeping the food stocked, so take what you want!

The buffet includes fresh made chicken fingers and Buffalo fingers (NOT the frozen kind!), beef teriyaki, stuffed mushrooms, pizza with assorted toppings, both cheese & chicken and cheese quesadillas, vegetable trays with veggie dip, and cheese & crackers. All cooked food is made fresh in the kitchen.

❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤

Invited Meetup Groups are:

Boston Singles:
http://www.meetup.com/BostonSingles/

Social Fun:

http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun/events/97611252/

Contact me (Matt Adams) if you run a Meetup group and would like to make this event available to your members.

❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤

I hope you all can join us for the next Boston Singles Party! This is new venue, with all you can eat appetizers, a DJ and dancing, so it's going be way better than the last one!

All the best,

~Matt

❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤

Parking For This Event:

Street parking is possible but it can be tough. Try your luck if you come early.

Otherwise there is a parking garage nearby at 47 Broad Street. CLICK HERE for a coupon to park for $10. You must PRINT OUT the coupon at bring it with you to the garage for the discount.

Taking the T:

The closet T stop is the Aquarium stop on the Blue line, and you would take the State Street exit. The next easiest T stop would be State Street stop on the Orange line.

:::PARTY REVIEWS:::
item.how_to_find_us: We're upstairs on the second floor.
item.name: Boston Singles Party - w/ Happy Hour & Buffet
